storyInfo: Despite her Uncle's objections, Maria spends several weeks training under Zofia and sees some improvement.

attributes.content: (My equipment's all good. My sword... it's the one Margaret used when she was training. It should still be usable, right?)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (Okay, I'm all set. Time to go...)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Oh... Uncle Młynar.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Let me guess. Off to blemish our family's reputation?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Am not—!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I've already heard about the Major from my colleagues.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You don't deserve to stand in an arena for knights. What's more, the Major doesn't deserve the Nearls.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Was it Zofia who gave you the idea?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: No! I signed up myself!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I figured as much. She may just be a lady-in-waiting to our family, but she nonetheless made a name for herself in that capitalist charade... She is a knight, for all that's worth.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: But what does that make you?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I... I just want to defend our...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Even if we're stripped of our nobility, our ideals remain unchanged. We have nothing to defend.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Even so...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Above all, there is nothing we need you to defend.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Don't be like your sister. Just because she's still young and full of beans, she lost all self-control—
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: —Yes, Chief?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Good evening. Yes, that's right, it's me...
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Worry not. If you have any questions about what we discussed in our last meeting, please do not hesitate... I beg your pardon? No, please. Please reconsider... Yes...
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Młynar glares at Maria and walks upstairs indifferently.
My apologies. I take full responsibility. I will have the corrected documents sent to you right away... Tomorrow, yes, I will have it ready for you tomorrow... I am very sorry.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Please. Please reconsider. Definitely. I won't ever make such a mistake again.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: —Maria, I'll deal with you another time. I hope you'll know your place.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Uncle Młynar...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Getting intimidated won't do me any good here... If I don't hurry, I'll be late for practice.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Nnngg—!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Watch your footing. And keep your rhythm.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Hnn—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: It's been ten minutes, and you haven't returned my attacks once.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Uhh... You said you'd take me on with just one hand, but that's a one-handed sword!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I wouldn't be using one hand If I really fought you. Or would you rather try a Leithanian style?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I knew knights from other countries had different fighting styles... Are you telling me you can fight like them too? You're actually picking on me, aren't you!?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Only a copycat. I lost that fight not for a lack of preparation, you know.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Auntie...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Well, it's all in the past. It's not something I lose sleep over.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I'm more worried about you. Look how unprepared you are... you're just sending yourself to a quick death, wanting to fight in the Major.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Hnng...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Alright, let's get back to it.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: O-Okay, but give me just another minute... My legs are still trembling...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: If you can't even handle this much, you'd better give up now.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Nnngg—! Okay, let's go!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The next day.
Haa.... Haaah... H-How's that?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: What do you mean, 'How's that?' You're barely standing upright.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Aside from sleeping and eating... we've basically... been working out the whole time... Don't you get tired at all, Zofia...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...You know about the team melees?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Those are the matches draw the crowds to the Kazimierz Major. Each knightclub sends a single representative—Well, in your case, you're joining the fray as an individual.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You have somewhere around a couple dozen people all in a huge, man-made arena. You rack up points by striking your opponents' armor, and those are added to your overall score.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Of course... if you're defeated or incapacitated before the time limit, you're immediately eliminated, and you score zero points.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...I-I know at least that much...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Uh huh. Then, tell me, do you know how long a single melee lasts?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...A few hours?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The longest melee match ever lasted the entire day and well into the night, after the audience kept cheering and the corporations kept tacking on overtime.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: The knights in that match were like a bunch of Gloompincers locked in a cage together. They had to rally themselves over and over to keep fighting each other.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Umm...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: One by one, the contestants fell either from exhaustion or injury, and no one got anything to show for it. On the other hand, the three who lasted till the very end raked in more than enough points to immediately advance to the main competitions.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I-I see... so the match lasted a whole day, and only three made it through...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Once we got the first division sponsor pushing that kind of ruleset, the copycats started to show up left and right across all divisions like Originium Slugs.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: It's certainly not a pretty sight, but what's worse is that the audience likes it. So nothing else matters.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Which means you'll have to be ready to fight an entire day!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: —An entire day?!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: A week later.
Phew...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Let's call it here. You're getting better at this.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ahh—
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Don't just lie down right after you're done working out. Get up and walk around a little. Maybe think about what to have for dinner tonight.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: O-Okay. Hmm! My legs are so sore...!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Well, of course. Your pacing is terrible.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: We can probably forget about winning the sprint race... All the top knightclubs have members who specialize in that, and if they show up, we've got no hope there.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: That said, mobility is still very important in artificial terrain.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Naturally, how well you do in the races has to do with how well-equipped you are. We've got to work on your stamina, but the real bottleneck there is our budget...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Are you even listening?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ahh—! I got it!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I just remembered Marcin gave me two meal coupons for fixing the jukebox the other day! Why don't we have dinner there tonight?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: What should I even do with you...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: D-Don't be mad! I just wanted to do something for you to show my gratitude!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I'm not mad. So, when are we leaving?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: We don't eat out together often... Is it okay if I take a shower and get a change of clothes first?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Okay... but we'll get right back to training after dinner. We don't have time for you to slack off.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (Maria is clearly making progress. And here I thought she decided to do this on a whim...)
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: (She's serious about this... and she's more serious than she looks. I was thinking she wouldn't be ready with so little training... I was even going to talk her out of it.)
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: (She's working so hard to get there, but she's just as cheerful as always... I wonder who she learned that from.)
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: (Is this her fighting spirit...?)
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Zofia lifts her head up. In the distance, far away from the garden overgrown with weeds, the lights of the towering skyscrapers glitter brilliantly in the city's skyline.
She quietly places her oft-unused hand on her sword's hilt, like she's deceiving herself.
Just as she expected, before she's even managed to unsheathe her sword, she feels an intense muscle pain shoot up her arm from her waist. She quickly lets go before she loses consciousness.
Three weeks later.
When was the last time those two brats showed their faces here? Could've paid the bar a visit on their time off. What are they being so shy for?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Are kids finally coming around to the idea of shutting yourself inside and training all day?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: ...When did anyone ever do that?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I did, back when I was a kid.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Knights train as they roam the world. Who ever heard of shutting yourself indoors just to train?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*. Filthy rich knights wouldn't know how hard life is for us common folk, with all the Catastrophe Messengers money can buy and the means to travel anywhere... You can't imagine how much hard work went into that sword of yours...
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: What are you mumbling on about now? If you're trying to pick a fight, then do it. I'm not afraid of you!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You can't possibly think I'm talking about you?!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Quiet down!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: ...You hear that...? They're working on her swordfighting.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I'm not deaf! Yeah, not bad. You know those shoddy practice swords on the market? Those are way too light to do any actual training with. Those trash manufacturers are always cutting corners.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Not these ones, though. They even sound beautiful. You can tell they're very fine blades... but how come I think I've heard this sword before?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Because you're old.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Why do I even bother talking to you? Get a move on!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: ...You aren't lost, are you? Got dementia or something?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: What's the hurry?! Zofia's garden is huge—We should've asked the servant at the gate for a motorcycle.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You aren't getting anywhere with a motorcycle here. There's more weeds than an overgrown forest.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Hey, watch your step.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Whew—Almost fell... What's this? An engine cover? In a garden?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Watch your step! Control your breath!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Y-Yes, ma'am!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hm... still the basics.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: They've been training for a month, and they're still working on the basics. Looks like we're going to miss out on a lot of points.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: ...Maybe you're the one with dementia here, Kowal.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You wanna say that again?!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Yes, they've been working on the basics for a month, but Maria's from the Nearl family.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Do you think she didn't practice these 'basics' back when Ol' Pegasus and Margaret were around?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Well... now that you mention it.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Area of expertise? Their standings? Why does any of that matter?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: A real Kazimierz knight should always be working on his technique.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Haah... haah...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Don't stop. Good momentum. Let's keep going!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: But... I'm really...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Right, right, I hear you. Let's make sure you stay in bed for the next three days, then—!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: (Whistle)
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Whew, that one thrust was something.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: It's a backhand thrust, it's fast, and above all, it hits where it matters, the vitals. So her training's paying off?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...How long have you been there?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Just got here.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Hohoh, watching her reminds me of the good old times when Margaret was still around.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Did you just...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Huh? Oh? I did that out of habit... Um... Did I do something?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Um... Where's your sword?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: T-That hit just now flung it away...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Don't get cocky! I'm just upset you managed to strike my opening!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Oh? So you do leave openings, Auntie Zofia.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Tsk...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Fine, a promise is a promise. You can fight in the Major.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: For real?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But I'll be there coaching you the whole time. You know nothing about the basics of the competitions, and there's still lots for you to learn... the scheduling, the scoring, how to analyze all the intel—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: —Don't lie down! Get up! We still have lots of preparation to do!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Come on... Just let me... take a short break...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Don't fall asleep on me!
attributes.name: Zofia
